She always had the urge to grow into a giantess and be bigger than everyone; Probably due to the fact that many of her friends would call her "shorty" or "midget" in school. One day, however, pan had had enough. She couldn't take the way her family looked down on her like she was some fragile item that if dropped would shatter. She decided to make her Giantess dreams into a reality. It would be hard though; she knew the only place to find a device to make herself grow would be the Capsule Corporation, but she didn't know how she would talk Bulma or Mr. Briefs into letting her have one. Either she could convince one of the two to let her have one using her little girlish charm, or she could steal it while they were not looking.
